title: Clavus Band, 6th–7th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun two ply Z-twist linen. Wefts: S-spun linen, S-spun wool.
Technique: slit tapestry woven with supplementary weft wrapping.
description: The central scene is an Annunciation scene with Mary in a chair and an angel at her shoulder. Top and bottom scenes may be vases with foliage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Clavus Band, 6th–7th century.
6th–7th century. Medium: Warp; S-spun two ply Z-twist linen. Wefts: S-spun linen, S-spun wool.
Technique: slit tapestry woven with supplementary weft wrapping.. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-23.
